Description:
A Must-See Modern Luxury!
From front to back, inside and out, everything in this brand-new Glenvill built home, has been done for you. Featuring full turnkey inclusions and premium upgrades, this family home features 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, alfresco and double remote garage.
- Roller blinds throughout
- Modern kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops & walk-in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Mirrored robes
- Solar gas hot water service
- Letterbox, clothesline, fencing, flyscreens and much more
This amazing home is perfect for investors, first home buyers and families and is located in the Cloverton Estate which will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds.
House Size: 22.5sqs
Land Size: 392sqm

Description:
Quality Build 4 Bedroom Family Home
Located in the prime location of the Cloverton within close proximity to Donnybrook train station, park lands, shopping, proposed schools and within an easy access to Hume Freeway, this 1 near new beautifully presented home offers an attractive opportunity for first home buyers seeking a leisurely lifestyle and an investment.
The functional floor plan provides loads of room for the growing family, with four spacious bedrooms and two living areas. The main bedroom includes en-suite, a large bathroom with bathtub, a stunning kitchen equipped with s/s appliances, dishwasher and with lot of storage space, all overlooking a large dining and living plus landscaped gardens and a lovely outdoor area with alfresco in the back.
Other features include: refrigerated cooling and heating , quality flooring, down lights, window furnishings, a large separate laundry with outdoor access and 2 car remote lock up garage with external and internal access.
Perfect for the first home buyer, growing family or astute investor. Don't let opportunity pass you by! Call now to arrange inspection.

Description:
Titled & Ready To Build
On offer is this great family size 400m2 block with big 12.5m frontage and 32m depth. No need to wait months or even years for land to be titled, this block of land is ready to build.
The land is located in the Kallo Estate. It is close to Hume freeway and Donnybrook train station. Minutes away from Victoria's biggest master planned community in Melbourne's North .
Within close proximity to parklands, schools, shopping centres, Hume freeway access, close to Donnybrook train station and easy access to all amenities.
Do not miss out!!!

Description:
Owner Says Sell! All Offers Welcome.
Seize the opportunity to start your life in the new and vibrant Kallo estate.
On offer is this vacant and Titled block with beautiful parkland views and a land size at a whopping 671m2 approx, Perfect for you to build your dream home now.
Situated only 40 minutes approx from the CBD and so much to offer such as Proposed primary and secondary schools, childcare and sporting ground facilities, shopping centre nearby with local shopping proposed.
This block is suitable for an array of home designs and provides the perfect opportunity for you to build your family home now.
Situated in one of the Victoria's largest master planned communities, with Educational facilities for all ages, destined to become a thriving new city with its existing transport connections including Hume Highway and Donnybrook Train Station.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Prestige Home Under 1 Year Of Age.
When walking in this home it will be love at first sight, with luxury living in mind and one of the area's finest homes, boasting five bedrooms, home theatre room, rumpus room, games area, multiple living rooms and remarkable attention to detail, design and build by Porter Davis "Prestige range".
Own a piece of real estate that will surely delight your senses with its luxury set across two spacious storeys.
On the ground floor, a grand entry welcomes you into your dream home in which the open plan kitchen with walk in pantry and butlers courters with stone benchtops and 60mm edge to island bench, 900mm Blanco appliances, stainless steel upright cooker, including wok burner and a Blanco dishwasher all adjoining to a large formal dining and family area that continues to a beautiful alfresco and home theatre room.
Upstairs, the master bedroom fit for a king & Queen, with its lavish ensuite and spa bath, large his and hers Walk-in-Robe and a private balcony to enjoy with a further 3 bedrooms all with adjoining ensuit and walk in robes.
Additional features include: Gas ducted heating, Solar hot water, Evaporative cooling, tinted double glazed windows, one click remote control electric roller shutters, a study that's large enough to be your optional 5th bedroom and so much more to mention, this home simply has it all and your inspection will be required to truly appreciate it in all its grandeur.
I look forward to introduce you to this wonderful family residence at the next open home.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219-221 High Street Thomastown 3074
767 High Street Epping 3076
510 Plenty Road Mill Park 3082
952-954 High Street Reservoir 3073

Description:
Elegance is the Key!
Introducing an elegant design for anyone looking to get started into the market or perhaps an investor.
Boasting 4 generous size bedrooms with built in robes, large master offering full ensuite with separate toilet & walk in robe. A great sized second bathroom and separate toilet. A standout kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry, stone bench top, natural light-filled living & meals area. Also featuring a second large formal living area.
A large alfresco area highlights the home's practicality and functionality for everyday family living. Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, remote control garage, quality finishing, low maintenance front and rear yards.
With Kalkallo expanding fast, this is a once in a life time opportunity to own your own real estate!!

Just Start Construction!
Titled and ready to be built on this fantatsic block is a ideal oppurtnity to build your first home, downsize from your larger family home or add to your growing investment portfolio. Situated in one of the norths most prominent and upcoming estates, Cloverton will be hosting new facilities to support the fast population growth including schools, shopping centre, childcare centre, and community centres. With the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook station only a few minutes nearby, this exciting new estate offers a vast array of accessibility, choice and freedom. Live in a place that gives your family the breathing space they deserve, while also supporting their needs with new facilities very close by.

A fantastic opportunity to purchase this brand new establishment designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. Description:
Nest or Invest!
Immaculate in presentation, built with style, comfort and luxury in mind, this nearly new home nestled on 448 sqm, with its spacious floor plan, designer flair & unbeatable location and grand entrance following the entertainers lounge area is sure to suit all home buyers. Master bedroom boasting a generous size en-suite and huge walk in robe. Walk on as you pass your laundry with storage cupboard and sliding door opening to your side yard, wander on through to your central kitchen, the heart of any family home, with large walk in pantry, plenty of storage space, open plan meals and family living area. Open up your double stacker sliding doors to your north/east alfresco perfect for outdoor entertainment. Walk on back through the hall way where you have a study nook, open wall feature niche, and large walk in linen cupboard. A central bathroom, separate toilet and 3 generous size bedrooms all with built in wardrobes.
Other features include: Quality Fixtures and Fittings, Stone Bench tops to Kitchen and Bathrooms
900mm Stainless Steel Range hood/ Oven, Dishwasher, ducted heating , evaporated cooling, security alarm system plus many more....
Nearby to parks, gardens, Shops, Schools and the Donnybrook train line and within only minutes you're driving on the Hume freeway with much less traffic to get you to the city and surrounding areas even quicker than ever before.
This home will provide everything you need at your fingertip.

Description:
Premium Titled Block Ready to Build
On offer is this great family size block with big 16m frontage and 32m depth. No need to wait months or even years for land to be titled, this block of land is ready to build.
The land is located in the Cloverton, the finest estate of Kalkallo. It is close to Hume freeway and Donnybrook train station. Minutes away from Victoria's biggest master planned community in Melbourne's North
that will offer parklands, schools, shopping centres, Hume freeway access, close to Donnybrook train station and easy access to all amenities. An opportunity that will not wait

Description:
It's Time To Buy A Place Of Your Own..
This Brand New Home is waiting for you,, Come on get out of the rental rat race. the time to make that move is NOW..
With a choice of 4 Floor plans this house ticks all the boxes,
4 bedrooms, Separate Living/Theatre Room....
Or ....
3 Bedrooms, Theatre Room/Separate Living and Alfresco
both including 2 Bathrooms, and Double Car Remote Garage.
Located in the up-and-coming Kalkallo on 400sqm land, close to future schools, shopping centres and Donnybrook train station
Hurry this package won't last long...!!!!!
All this can be yours..
Make your dream of owning your own home come true..
Call Lorraine 0405 311 879
Your choice of...
· 3 or 4 Bedrooms
· 2 Bathrooms
· Remote Control Garage
· Choice of Theatre Room or Alfresco
· Flyscreens
· Walk-in Pantry
· 900mm Stainless Steel Rangehood
· 900mm stainless Steel Cooktop/Oven
· Stainless Steel Dishwasher
· Stone Benchtops throughout
· Ducted Heating
· Evaporative Cooling
· Front Landscaping
· Fixed Site Cost
· Letter Box & Clothes Line
· 2550mm High Ceilings
· NBN Ready
... and so much more.....
What are you waiting for..??
It's time to make your decision,
Buy & Build .. Nest or Invest...
Either way, Call Lorraine Today 0405 311 879

Description:
Stylish Design by Porter Davis!
You've ever wanted to live or invest in a brand new four bedroom home, with interior style and colour themes selected by a professional interior designer, then this home built by Porter Davis is what you've been looking for.
With four bedrooms, two living areas, sparkling bathrooms, master with walk in robe & full ensuite, alfresco area and a double garage. Luxury turn-key inclusions such as stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings, front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home. Plus, If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG.
You can purchase this brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed. Call us now for further information or to arrange an inspection
Images for illustration purposes only and include examples of upgrade options.
